text.text_translated:
An asteroid is a big rock in space. Now, NASA is trying to find and record some small asteroids. These asteroids are 140 metres wide or more. There are about 25,000 of these rocks. NASA has found and recorded about 8,000. So, 17,000 asteroids are not found yet.

In 2013, a smaller asteroid, 19 metres wide, exploded above the city of Chelyabinsk in Russia. It hurt 1,200 people. If the asteroids of this size come near Earth, they can be very dangerous.

best_attempt.text_translated:
An asteroid is a big rock in space. NASA is going to find and write down many small asteroids. These asteroids are 140 metres wide or more. There are about 25,000 of these rocks. NASA has found and written down about 8,000. So, 17,000 asteroids are not found yet. 

In 2013, a smaller asteroid, 19 metres wide, exploded in the sky above Chelyabinsk, a city in Russia. It hurt 1,200 people. If the medium rocks come near Earth, they can be very dangerous.
